casebody.data:
In the Matter of TEAJAY STORES CORPORATION, Bankrupt. In the Matter of T. J. HEALEY, Inc., Bankrupt, Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit October 18, 1928. No. 30. Chaunecy H. Levy, of New York City, for appellant. Archibald Palmer, of New York City (Max L. Rosenstein, of Newark, N. J., of counsel), for Morris Glaser. Yankauer, Davidson & Mann, of New York City (Leo Wechsler, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
